main() {\r\n#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE\r\n    freopen(\"input.txt\", \"r\", stdin);\r\n    freopen(\"output.txt\", \"w\", stdout);\r\n#endif\r\n    IOS;\r\n    ll n, i, k, ans = 0, cnt = 0;\r\n    cin >> n;\r\n    ll a[n];\r\n    a[0] = 0, a[n + 1] = 1001;\r\n\r\n    fr1(i, n) cin >> a[i];\r\n\r\n    fr1(i, n)\r\n    {\r\n        if (a[i] == a[i - 1] + 1 && a[i] == a[i + 1] - 1 ) {cnt++; ans = max(ans, cnt);}\r\n        else cnt = 0;\r\n    }\r\n    cout << ans << endl;\r\n\r\n    return 0;\r\n}\r\n"
}
